# LabelStyleConfiguration.Title

**Structure**

A type-erased title view of a label.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct Title
```

## Setting the title

- **title**: A description of the labeled item.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- View

items.description: A description of the labeled item.
items.name: title

title: LabelStyleConfiguration.Title
